description.first: Full Stack Developer with 3+ years of professional experience in Next.js, React, and modern web technologies. Currently working as part of the House of CB team.
description.second: Passionate about building software products that optimize processes and enhance user experience, while contributing to scalable and high-performance applications.
description.third: Skilled in team collaboration, Agile practices, and designing modern frontend architectures.

houseofcb.title: House of CB
houseofcb.subTitle: Full Stack Developer, May 2024 - Present
list: Migrated a high-traffic e-commerce platform to Next.js 14, achieving a more scalable and efficient architecture with improved performance by 30%.
Reorganized project structure, developed reusable UI components, and proposed UX and performance enhancements for a platform handling +3000 users per hour.
Designed responsive pages with React and Tailwind CSS, collaborated with backend team in PHP, and contributed to email templates and staging tasks.
Participated in technical decision-making and frontend organization within the team.
Currently working on React Native development and building a dashboard for mobile app management.

strongwood.title: Strongwood
strongwood.subTitle: Front End Developer, Apr 2023 - Sep 2023
list: Freelance project for a furniture manufacturing company, developed with Next.js and React.
Designed and implemented full website architecture, UI/UX, and frontend features.
Coordinated directly with the client to gather requirements and present deliverables.

watts.title: 25Watts
watts.subTitle: Front End Developer, Oct 2022 - Apr 2024
list: Developed custom websites for clients (portfolios, e-commerce, blogs, landing pages) using WordPress, Next.js, and React.
Implemented new features and API integrations, ensuring smooth functionality and performance.
Worked under Agile methodologies (Scrum) and applied best practices in code quality and version control.

firstParagraph.text: More than 700 hours of intensive learning in Full Stack development, applying agile methodologies (Scrum). Development of an individual project (SPA) and a group project focused on e-commerce.
